condition.narrative: Schedule 2. Section I. A.2.b. The Borrower shall cause the Project Implementing Entity to ensure that the staff referred to inparagraphs Section I.A.2(ii) above is hired or appointed, in a manner acceptable to the Bank, no later than one month (1) after theEffective Date.

Schedule 2. Section I. A.3. Not later than twelve (12) months after the Effective Date (unless the Bank, after consideration of thereasons for the delay, establishes a later date by written notification to the Project Implementing Entity and the Borrower), theBorrower shall cause the Project Implementing Entity to establish, and thereafter operate and maintain, at all times during Projectimplementation, a regional PIU office located in the Municipality of Moca, with structure, functions and responsibilitiesacceptable to the Bank and with staff in number and with qualifications and experience acceptable to the Bank, all as set forth inthe Operational Manual.

Schedule 2. Section I.A.4. Without limitation upon the provisions of Section 5.09 of the General Conditions, no later than one (1)month after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall cause the Project Implementing Entity to establish, and thereafter maintainthroughout the implementation of the Project, accounting, reporting, and internal control processes acceptable to the Bank, all inaccordance with the criteria set forth in the Operational Manual.
